item.title: Kushner sells stake in firm using tax breaks he lobbied for
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) — President Donald Trump’s son-in-rules and adviser Jared Kushner has sold his stake in a firm investing in Opportunity Zone projects offering tax breaks he had for my piece lobbied for in Washington, sparking criticism that he used to be taking benefit of his White House goal.
